headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Arch Capital (ACGL) Q4 Earnings
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Arch Capital (ACGL) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Arch Capital (ACGL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 22.16% and 6.14%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
raw.summary: Arch Capital (ACGL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 22.16% and 6.14%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Arch Capital: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda (AP) — Arch Capital Group Ltd. (ACGL) on Monday reported fourth-quarter profit of $935 million. The Pembroke, Bermuda-based company said it had profit of $2.42 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were $2.26 per share.
